What is Get Mastered?

Get Mastered is an audio consultation and mastering service run by professional mastering engineers. We are the only professional service that provides musicians, engineers, and podcasters of all levels a chance to grow their own production skills through personalized mix feedback and recording assistance. Below is just one example of the difference we can make to your audio through our collaborative mastering process:





Our mastering engineers strive to bring your audio to a professional level, at rates that are the absolute best value for your dollar. We offer assistance at the recording, mixing, and mastering stages to improve both your audio quality and your own production skills. Just read reviews from our happy customers, listen to some more examples of our work and get started today with your first project free!

Learn more about Get Mastered, our engineers, and our vision, by clicking here, or keep scrolling to see our services and rates.



Music Mastering


With Get Mastered, you don't just get a master. You get a personal mastering engineer who will work with you to make your music the best it can be. In addition to making your tracks louder, your albums cohesive, and your songs ready for release, our engineers take pride in artistically enhancing your track to fit your unique style and tastes.

We don't rush quality. We take time to listen to and understand your track, so that we can bring it to its full potential. If you do absolutely need a rush job, we are happy to work with you at no extra cost.

Calculate your price

Our Memberships


Amazing music doesn't start at the mastering stage. That is why we offer Mix Feedback, giving you access to your mastering engineer during your mixing process.

Signing up as a Mix Feedback subscriber lets you enjoy the detailed assistance of your mastering engineer with any mix level issues you are having before the mastering stage, along with their professional opinion of your mix. This additional stage in the mastering process is a win-win: you get to stay in control and hone your mixing and recording skills, while we get to give you the absolute best master possible.

While we launch, try us out with your first month free, and receive free Mix Feedback with every master. Plus receive one bonus Mix Feedback every month for songs you're not ready to master. Start learning from professionals today!

Mix Feedback


Amazing music doesn't start at the mastering stage. That is why we offer Mix Feedback, giving you access to your mastering engineer during your mixing process.

Signing up as a Mix Feedback subscriber lets you enjoy the detailed assistance of your mastering engineer with any mix level issues you are having before the mastering stage, along with their professional opinion of your mix. This additional stage in the mastering process is a win-win: you get to stay in control and hone your mixing and recording skills, while we get to give you the absolute best master possible.

While we launch, try us out with your first month free, and receive free Mix Feedback with every master. Plus receive one bonus Mix Feedback every month for songs you're not ready to master. Start learning from professionals today!

Podcast Mastering


We also offer audio improvement, mixing, and mastering for podcasts. Whether you want to pay monthly or pay as you go, we will be here with you every step of the way, helping you achieve professional quality audio for your podcast.

We can help you mitigate clicks, pops, and hums in your dialogue, plus, included with our podcast mastering service is complimentary recording assistance. With recording assistance, we offer personalized tips to get you get the best recording possible to help you acheive professional quality recordings within your budget. Try us out with your first podcast master on us.

What are people saying about us?


"Keenan was extremely prompt and professional and made me feel like my project was #1 on his agenda! Very satisfied with Get Mastered and will be using them from now on!" - Alex Ward

"Keenan was amazing, he worked with me throughout the process and even helped advise me on subtle ways to make my record better. He cared not just about his work process but what I did as well, and that's what makes the best records – people working together. If you want a mastering engineer to help take your recordings to the next level, Keenan's your guy." - Andrew Nappo

"Keenan’s mastering was brilliant. All of the hours I spent recording and writing my song became totally worth it once I placed it in his hands. I care about my songs a lot, and it quickly became evident that Keenan cared, too." - Matt Bennett

"I had a great time working with Keenan from Get Mastered. He approached my music with an open-minded, collaborative attitude, offering constructive advice and expertise while still working to retain the spirit and vision of what I was trying to make. He's a talented engineer with a solid ear - I would recommend him to anyone!" - Matthew O'Connor

"Keenan was very professional, polite, and informative working with me on my track. He answered my questions and made sure that it came out the way I wanted. Not only did it come out sounding stellar, but I learned a bit about my craft as well. I'll be using him in the future for mastering my work." - Asa Jones

"Keenan did a great job finishing the tracks. He brought some nice stuff out in the mix that I didn't hear before and made sure that everything was very even and still had punch to it. Great work." - Max Gunther

"I was very impressed with the work Keenan did to my mix. He helped to make my lo-fi recording sound clean and crisp, was receptive to any further requests, and handled all communications in a professional manner." - Hilary of btwolf

"Excellent service, very professional and easy to work with. Keenan edited his work on pieces that I wanted modified, and was very punctual and flexible throughout the whole process." - Jack Tarricone

"Getmastered.com is everything a musician needs. Keenan tweaks everything how you want it to be until you are satisfied and gets everything done very quickly. If you need something done in really short period of time, you can't go wrong with this guy. Great sound quality and fully professional service." - Adam of Hope Burn

“Keenan did an excellent job mastering my songs. He was responsive to my notes and, as we collaborated, was quick to turn around each new draft. I’d recommend his services to anyone looking to get their project professionally mastered.” - Colin Zelin
